name: left
description: String, or list of [navigation items](#nav-items) to appear in the left region of the footer

name: right
description: String, or list of [navigation items](#nav-items) to appear in the right region of the footer

name: center
description: String, or list of [navigation items](#nav-items) to appear in the center region of the footer

name: border
description: Footer border (`true`, `false`, or a border color)
